nodes.text: The Ryborean sector was located in the Outer Expansion Zone sub-region and the Northern Dependencies portion of the Expansion Region. In 0 ABY, it bordered the Drannik sector in the trailing direction and the Inner Rim Coreward. At its Rimward edge the sector formed a four-way border with the Deadalis sector as well as the Mid Rim's Abaar and Vorc sectors. The sector retained those borders by 12 ABY, by which time it was situated within space controlled by the New Republic.

The Ryborean sector contained the Ryborea system, the origin point of the Ryborean gax beverage, and the Aramal system, which was situated at the intersection of two hyperlanes. One of the routes linked the Ryborean to the Deadalis and Drannik sectors, while the other joined it with the Vorc sector and the Inner Rim.
The Ryborean sector was established in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, authored by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart.
